ingredients.ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
1 (5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix

cookingTips: Mix ingredients in the order listed for best texture and consistency
Serve with graham crackers, gingersnaps, or apple slices for optimal dipping
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help me make this simple pumpkin dip that's crowd-pleasing and easy. Any tricks for getting the texture perfectly fluffy?
